item.title: Where to invest NOW after Trump's tariffs and what it means for your pension: The definitive guide by the Mail's money experts
item.author: dailymail.co.uk
item.description:
Version 2
President Trump's sweeping tariffs will have far-reaching consequences for our investments - but not all will be affected equally.
All countries will face tariffs of at least 10 per cent when exporting goods to the US, but some will have more than 50 per cent. As these differences open u...
